condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Substantial progress has been made in WASH, framed within the CPD's theory of change for WASH and the annual workplan for 2019 that was signed between UNICEF and the Ministry of Water. Major achievements have been the in-depth WASH analysis executed in partnership with the National Institute for Statistics to strengthen the national WASH evidence base, the innovative focus on climate change impact on children and the sector review through a WASH BAT process. Although 2019 has been the first year that UNICEF Ecuador started to support the WASH sector, UNICEF has built strong credibility and leadership within the sector. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
